item.title: 特朗普称美国将保留对房利美和房地美分拆的监督和担保
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，美国政府将保留对房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）的抵押贷款担保和监督职能，因为他正致力于将美国抵押贷款融资公司上市。 特朗普在 "真相社交 "网站上发文称："我正在努力将这些了不起的公司上市，但我想明确一点，美国政府将保留其隐含的担保，我作为总统将坚定地坚持监督这些公司的立场。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that the U.S. government will retain its mortgage guarantees and oversight role for Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac as he works to take the U.S. mortgage finance firms public. "I am working on TAKING THESE AMAZING COMPANIES PUBLIC, but I want to be clear, the U.S. Government will keep its implicit GUARANTEES, and I will stay strong in my position on overseeing them as President," Trump said in a post on Truth Social.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国勉强授权雪佛龙保留在委内瑞拉的资产
item.description: 两位知情人士周二透露，特朗普政府已授权美国石油生产商雪佛龙公司（Chevron）保留在委内瑞拉的资产，包括与委内瑞拉国家石油公司（PDVSA）的合资石油公司股份。【原文：The Trump administration has issued a narrow authorization for U.S. oil producer Chevron to keep assets in Venezuela, including its stakes in oil joint ventures with state company PDVSA, two sources with knowledge of the decision said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 通用磨坊本季度因结构调整支出 7000 万美元
item.description: 通用磨坊公司（General Mills）周二表示，作为 Cheerios 谷物食品生产商重组工作的一部分，该公司将在本季度计提约 7000 万美元的费用，主要是遣散费用。【原文：General Mills said on Tuesday it would record a charge of about $70 million in its current quarter, mainly reflecting severance expenses, as part of the Cheerios cereal maker's restructuring efforts.】

item.title: 交易日：日本扩大长债宽松范围
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，通用汽车将投资至少 8 亿美元在纽约工厂生产发动机
item.description: 据两位熟知内情的消息人士透露，通用汽车公司将在纽约的一家推进器工厂投资至少 8 亿美元，以提高那里的发动机产量。【原文：General Motors is investing at least $800 million at a New York propulsion plant to increase engine production there, according to two sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 半导体 ETF 期权在英伟达业绩公布前表现谨慎
item.description: 当人工智能芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）周三公布业绩时，期权市场的交易员们正准备迎接整个行业的波动，主要半导体 ETF 的防御性期权合约吸引了大量交易。【原文：Traders in the options markets are bracing for industry-wide volatility when AI-chipmaker Nvidia reports results on Wednesday, with defensive options contracts on a major semiconductor ETF drawing heavy trading.】

item.title: 加利福尼亚州最大的公用事业公司高管表示，对数据中心的兴趣猛增 40% 以上
item.description: 加利福尼亚州最大的电力公司 PG&E 的一位高管周二告诉路透社记者，今年该州北部数据中心开发商提出的供电要求猛增了 40% 以上。【原文：PG&E , California's largest electric utility, has seen a jump of more than 40% this year in requests for power supplies from data center developers across the northern part of the state, an executive with the company told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国汽车市场价格战引发行业洗牌担忧
item.description: 中国汽车行业的价格战愈演愈烈，加剧了人们对全球最大汽车市场将出现长期预期的大洗牌的担忧。【原文：An intensifying auto industry price war in China has stoked fears of a long-anticipated shake-out in the world’s largest car market.】

item.title: 新堡垒能源公司披露纳斯达克通知
item.description: 美国液化天然气公司新堡垒能源（New Fortress Energy）周二表示，该公司收到了纳斯达克的通知，称其没有向美国证券交易委员会提交季度报告，不符合证券市场的上市规则。【原文：U.S. LNG company New Fortress Energy on Tuesday said it received a notice from Nasdaq on non-compliance with the stock market's listing rule for not submitting its quarterly reports with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: 摩托罗拉解决方案公司将以 44 亿美元收购思尔沃思技术公司
item.description: 摩托罗拉解决方案公司周二表示，将以 44 亿美元的价格收购无线无线电制造商 Silvus Technologies。【原文：Motorola Solutions said on Tuesday it would acquire wireless-radio maker Silvus Technologies for $4.4 billion.】

item.title: BBVA 到 2030 年将在墨西哥投资 52 亿美元
item.description: 西班牙对外银行（BBVA）周二发表声明称，该银行计划到 2030 年在墨西哥投资超过 1,000 亿比索（51.9 亿美元）。【原文：Spanish bank BBVA plans to invest more than 100 billion pesos ($5.19 billion) in Mexico through 2030, it said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 花旗银行波兰分行将向 Velobank 出售消费银行业务
item.description: 花旗集团周二表示，其波兰分部已同意将波兰的消费银行业务出售给 Velobank，这家华尔街巨头多年来退出非核心零售银行市场的努力已接近尾声。【原文：Citigroup said on Tuesday its Polish unit has agreed to sell its consumer banking business in the country to Velobank, as the Wall Street giant nears the end of a years-long effort to exit non-core retail banking markets.】

item.title: 墨西哥认为 USMCA 审查将于 9 月底或 10 月初开始
item.description: 墨西哥经济部长马塞洛-埃布拉德（Marcelo Ebrard）周二表示，墨西哥预计将于今年第四季度初正式开始对与美国和加拿大签订的三边贸易协定进行审查。【原文：Mexico expects a planned review of the trilateral trade pact with the U.S. and Canada to formally begin at the beginning of the fourth quarter this year, Economy Minister Marcelo Ebrard said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据 Semafor 报道，马斯克的 Neuralink 公司以 90 亿美元的估值筹集现金
item.description: 据 Semafor 周二援引知情人士的话报道，埃隆-马斯克的大脑植入公司 Neuralink 以 90 亿美元的估值融资 6 亿美元。【原文：Elon Musk's brain implant company Neuralink raised $600 million at a valuation of $9 billion, Semafor reported on Tuesday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 彭博社：美国警告倍耐力可能因中国投资者而受到出售限制
item.description: 据彭博社周二报道，美国已警告倍耐力，由于担心其中国投资者对这家轮胎制造商的影响，安装了其数据收集技术的汽车的销售可能会受到限制。【原文：The United States has warned Pirelli that sales of vehicles fitted with its data-collecting technology could be restricted due to concerns over the influence on the tyremaker of its Chinese investor, Bloomberg reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克计划在测试失败后首次发射 "星际飞船 "之前发表火星演讲
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）预计将于周二在当天晚些时候进行高风险的 "星际飞船"（Starship）试飞之前，介绍 SpaceX 公司向火星发射任务计划的最新情况。【原文：Elon Musk was expected on Tuesday to present an update on SpaceX's plan to launch missions to Mars ahead of a high-stakes Starship test flight later in the day.】

item.title: 罢工工人批准了 RTX 普惠公司的最新合同提议
item.description: 据国际机械师和航空航天工人协会（International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers）称，RTX 的普惠公司（Pratt & Whitney）罢工工人周二以 74% 的比例批准了该公司的第二份合同。【原文：Striking workers at RTX's Pratt & Whitney approved the company's second contract offer on Tuesday by 74%, according to the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers.】

item.title: 罢工工人批准 RTX 的普惠公司提出的第二份合同要约
item.description: 据国际机械师和航空航天工人协会发言人称，RTX公司普惠公司的罢工工人周二批准了该公司提出的第二份合同，结束了长达三周的罢工。【原文：Striking workers at RTX's Pratt & Whitney approved the company's second contract offer on Tuesday, ending a three-week-long strike, according to a spokesperson for the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers.】

item.title: 加拿大哈德逊湾零售连锁店将在周日前解雇 8,300 多名员工
item.description: 据周一晚些时候公布的文件显示，加拿大哈德逊湾公司计划在周日之前裁员 8347 人，占其员工总数的 89%，届时该公司将结束清算销售并关闭所有门店。【原文：Canada's Hudson's Bay Company plans to lay off 8,347 employees, or 89% of its workforce, by Sunday when it will conclude its liquidation sale and shut all stores, according to documents published late on Monday.】

item.title: LA28 引进 Snowflake 作为数据协作提供商
item.description: 美国数据云分析公司 Snowflake 周二表示，该公司已被指定为 2028 年洛杉矶奥运会和残奥会以及美国队的官方数据协作提供商。【原文：Data cloud analytics company Snowflake has been appointed the official data collaboration provider for the 2028 Olympic and Paralympic Games in Los Angeles as well as Team USA, the American company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 未来五年，Telus 将在加拿大投资 500 多亿美元
item.description: 加拿大电信公司 Telus 周二表示，未来五年将在加拿大投资超过 700 亿加元（508.8 亿美元），以扩大其在加拿大的网络基础设施。【原文：Telus is investing more than C$70 billion ($50.88 billion) in Canada over the next five years to expand its network infrastructure in the country, the telecom company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 半导体晶圆供应商索泰克撤回全年及中期指导计划
item.description: 法国半导体材料供应商 Soitec 因汽车和工业芯片需求连续多年下滑，于本周二撤销了新财年和中期的预测目标。【原文：French semiconductor materials supplier Soitec on Tuesday withdrew forecast targets for its new fiscal year and the medium term, following a multi-year slump in automotive and industrial chip demand.】

item.title: 巴西检察官起诉比亚迪侵犯劳工权利
item.description: 巴西检察院周二发表声明称，巴西劳工检察官对中国汽车制造商比亚迪提起民事诉讼，指控其贩卖人口，并为工人提供 "奴隶般的工作条件"。【原文：Brazilian labor prosecutors filed a public civil action against Chinese carmaker BYD for alleged human trafficking and "slavery-like conditions" for workers, according to a statement from the prosecutors office issued on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回美国原住民对力拓亚利桑那州铜矿项目的质疑
item.description: 美国最高法院周二拒绝审理一个美国原住民团体以宗教权利为由提出的阻止力拓和必和必拓获得亚利桑那州土地控制权的诉讼，而这块土地是用来建造世界上最大的铜矿之一--该项目位于阿帕奇人长期用于举行神圣仪式的土地上。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court declined on Tuesday to hear a Native American group's bid based on religious rights to block Rio Tinto and BHP from gaining control of Arizona land needed to build one of the world's largest copper mines - a project situated on land long used for Apache sacred rituals.】

item.title: 台积电仍在评估 ASML 的 "High-NA"，英特尔正关注其未来用途
item.description: 全球最大的合约芯片制造商台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co，2330.TW）一位高管周二表示，该公司仍在评估何时在未来的工艺节点上使用 ASML 的尖端高数值孔径 (NA) 机器。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co (2330.TW), the world's largest contract chipmaker, is still assessing when it will use ASML's cutting-edge high numerical aperture (NA) machines for its future process nodes, an executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国法官将 Citgo 母公司拍卖的置顶期延长至 6 月 2 日
item.description: 美国特拉华州法院周二公布的一份文件显示，美国联邦法官已将竞标者在法院组织的委内瑞拉炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 母公司股份拍卖中提交竞标书的期限至少延长至 6 月 2 日。【原文：A U.S. federal judge has extended to at least June 2 a period for bidders to submit rival bids in a court-organized auction of shares in the parent of Venezuela-owned refiner Citgo Petroleum, according to filing released by the Delaware court on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国 5 月消费者信心改善，关税焦虑挥之不去
item.description: 在华盛顿与中国之间的贸易战休战之际，美国消费者信心在连续五个月恶化后于5月份有所改善，但家庭仍然担心关税会提高价格并损害经济。【原文：U.S. consumer confidence improved in May after deteriorating for five straight months amid a truce in the trade war between Washington and China, though households continued to worry about tariffs raising prices and hurting the economy.】

item.title: 特朗普称欧盟呼吁召开贸易会议是积极的
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，欧盟建立谈判的举措是积极的，他希望欧洲能 "开放 "与美国的贸易，同时他重申了自己的威胁，即如果不能达成协议，他将单方面强加贸易条件。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday said the EU's move to set up talks was positive and that he hoped Europe would "open up" to trade with the U.S. even as he reiterated his threat to unilaterally impose trade terms if no agreement emerges.】

item.title: 专家称，特朗普的核能命令将推动铀价上涨和投资增加
item.description: 业内专家表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统为重振美国核能产业而发布的最新命令可能会使铀市场摆脱目前的低迷状态，并提高投资者的兴趣。【原文：President Donald Trump's latest orders seeking to revitalize the U.S. nuclear energy industry could pull the uranium market out of its current lull and boost investor interest, industry experts said.】

item.title: 独家报道备忘录显示，联合利华将保证欧洲冰淇淋工人的就业条件长达三年
item.description: 根据一份备忘录，Ben & Jerry's 的制造商联合利华已同意保证其冰淇淋工人在欧洲和英国的就业条件，时间至少为企业分拆后的三年，是此类交易通常期限的三倍。【原文：Ben & Jerry's maker Unilever has agreed to guarantee its ice cream workers' employment terms in Europe and Britain for at least three years after the business' spin-off, according to a memo, tripling the usual period in such deals.】
